name: The Pixie Kingdom
overview: The Pixie Kingdom is an Amiga labyrinth/maze arcade game. The evil leader Nogrim has invaded the Pixie Kingdom and is holding them prisoner in their own city! One pixie escaped and now asks you to return and rescue the innocent pixies... You set off immediately with sword in hand to face whatever Nogrim might throw at you! Fight if you must, find the keys and take the pixies to the exit.
